  • Uses of SimpleConnection in net.minecraftforge.network.simple.handler

    Subinterfaces of SimpleConnection in net.minecraftforge.network.simple.handler
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    SimpleHandlerFlow<BUF extends FriendlyByteBuf,BASE>
     
    interface 
    SimpleHandlerProtocol<BUF extends FriendlyByteBuf,BASE>
    Entry point for a SimpleChannel protocol that mimics vanilla's Packet system where every packet must implement SimplePacket and will have their handle(CTX, Context) method called.
